items.Name: Uranium Ore
items.Description: The ore sample is Naturally Occurring Radioactive Materials (NORM). Uranium Ore samples are useful as check sources for testing Geiger Counters.

items.Name: A suture practice kit
items.Description: Not quite a game, not quite medical school, this suture training kit will have you fixing up wounds and repairing hems with ease

items.Name: Dill pickle lip balm
items.Description: Some people want their mouths to be minty fresh, or sweetly scented. And others just want their lips to have the distinct flavor of something that might accompany a pastrami sandwich.

items.Name: A baby mop
items.Description: It's never too early to teach your children about chores, as evidenced by this suit that lets your baby mop the house for you.

items.Name: A Nicolas Cage sequin pillowcase
items.Description: The only thing better than a festive red sparkly pillowcase is one that morphs into Nicolas Cage's face with the satisfying swipe of your hand.
Features: Precisely printed using eco-friendly water based inks
sublimation printing technology to ensure smoothness
